metadata.Title: CVE-2018-6093 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Insufficient origin checks in Blink in Google Chrome prior to 66.0.3359.117 allowed a remote attacker to leak cross-origin data via a crafted HTML page.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-6093` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

chromium-browser - 66.0.3359.139-0ubuntu0.18.04.3
chromium-browser-l10n - 66.0.3359.139-0ubuntu0.18.04.3
chromium-chromedriver - 66.0.3359.139-0ubuntu0.18.04.3
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg - 66.0.3359.139-0ubuntu0.18.04.3
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg-extra - 66.0.3359.139-0ubuntu0.18.04.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: chromium-browser package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '66.0.3359.139-0ubuntu0.18.04.3').
